content.description: We're hosting a meetup where Epsagon, Thundra, Dashbird and Lumigo will give a session each on serverless observability.
One Day. One Track. One Community.

content.event: giovedì 30 aprile alle 18:30, Simone Zennaro @ Serverless Live #29
content.description: Ci vediamo giovedì 30 aprile alle 18:30 con Serverless Italy Meetup in streaming #29.

content.event: Nordic Serverless More than a key-value store: Getting the most out of DynamoDB
content.description: Join us for a meetup around DynamoDB with AWS Data Hero Alex DeBrie.
En partenariat avec notre meetup, cette première session des ServerlessDays Paris en remote se déroulera en anglais car nous avons le plaisir d'accueillir Yan Cui et Rita Kozlov.
Finally on the same stage we'll have Adrian Hornsby and Gunnar Grosch talking about chaos engineering from a serverless perspective.

content.description: Learn real-world tactics for transforming your organization to get the most out of the cloud.

content.event: AWS Serverless-First Function - Serverless for your Application
content.description: Consider this event your complete builder’s guide to serverless applications.
Let's learn how to deploy your serverless applications using AWS Cli
